name: Malkia
description: Malkia is a unique real-time strategy game set in the fictional Central African country of Kovi, where you help the eponymous hero to grow her business so that she can put food on the family's table and educate her children.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: 2.2GHz or faster Intel Pentium 4, Intel Core Family, AMD Athlon Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Anything DX9 capable Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: 2.2GHz or faster Intel Pentium 4, Intel Core Family, AMD Athlon Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Anything DX9 capable Storage: 500 MB available space
